    • Method Detail

      • refreshAccessToken

        public static String refreshAccessToken()
                                 throws Exception
        Call this method to refresh the access token. This method will return the new access token and also sets all those new access details in MovesAPIPreferences
        Returns:
        New access token
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getProfile

        public static void getProfile(MovesHandler<ProfileData> handler)
        Use this method to fetch the Profile information of a user from Moves Server
        Parameters:
        handler - : A MovesHandler implementation which will get notified with success/failure
        See Also:
        Moves Developer Page for Profile

      • getDailySummaryList

        public static void getDailySummaryList(MovesHandler<ArrayList<SummaryListData>> handler,
                       String specificSummary,
                       String from,
                       String to,
                       String pastDays,
                       String updatedSince)
        Use this method to fetch the Summary information of a user from Moves Server
        Parameters:
        handler - : A MovesHandler implementation which will get notified with success/failure
        specificSummary - : If present, should be appended with API path
        from - : Range start in yyyyMMdd or yyyy-MM-dd format
        to - : Range end in yyyyMMdd or yyyy-MM-dd format
        pastDays - : How many past days to return, including today (in users current time zone)
        updatedSince - : [optional] if set, return only days which data has been updated since given time stamp in ISO 8601 (yyyyMMdd’T’HHmmssZ) format, pass null if not required.
        See Also:
        Moves Developer Page for Daily Summaries
